post.title: AI Is Creating CSAM
post.excerpt: Nudify is allowing women to be "de-nuded" by running deep-fakes to remove their clothing. This includes underage girls. So effectively it is making millions making child sexual abuse materials (CSAM). https://medium.com/history-of-women/ai-undresses-women-and-girls-for-fun-makes-36-million-in-profit-967f00a3da9a
post.content: Nudify is allowing women to be "de-nuded" by running deep-fakes to remove their clothing. This includes underage girls. So effectively it is making millions making child sexual abuse materials (CSAM). https://medium.com/history-of-women/ai-undresses-women-and-girls-for-fun-makes-36-million-in-profit-967f00a3da9a
